creator: stefanescu.adrian@ssi-schaefer.ro

text:
You might want to check in the generated source code. It should be quite obvious
which one is called. I don't think an "int" attribute will be called directly.
creator: remm@apache.org
stefanescu.adrian@ssi-schaefer.ro
william.barker@wilshire.com
text:
The JSP spec requires that the JSP engine uses JavaBeans introspection to 
determine the attributes.  Your example doesn't conform to the JavaBeans model 
(different types for getters and setters), so Tomcat can't support it.
